mapper.select: SELECT s.ID as id, s.NAME as name, s.TYPE as type, s.LINK as link, s.ICON as icon, s.PARENT_ID as parentId, s.FLAG as flag, s.MEMO as memo, s.STATE as state, s.ADD_TIME as addTime, s.ADD_USER_ID as addUserId, s.MOD_TIME as modTime, s.MOD_USER_ID as modUserId, s.UPDATE_LOCK as updateLock FROM SYS_T_RESOURCE s ORDER BY s.MOD_TIME DESC

SELECT s.ID as id, s.NAME as name, s.TYPE as type, s.LINK as link, s.ICON as icon, s.PARENT_ID as parentId, s.FLAG as flag, s.MEMO as memo, s.STATE as state, s.ADD_TIME as addTime, s.ADD_USER_ID as addUserId, s.MOD_TIME as modTime, s.MOD_USER_ID as modUserId, s.UPDATE_LOCK as updateLock FROM SYS_T_RESOURCE s WHERE s.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_T_RESOURCE ( NAME, TYPE, LINK, ICON, PARENT_ID, FLAG, MEMO, STATE, ADD_TIME, ADD_USER_ID, MOD_TIME, MOD_USER_ID, UPDATE_LOCK ) VALUES( #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{link, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{parentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addUserId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modUserId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateLock, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_T_RESOURCE SET NAME = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK = #{link, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON = #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLAG = #{flag, jdbcType=BIT}, MEMO = #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state, jdbcType=TINYINT}, MOD_TIME = #{modTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOD_USER_ID = #{modUserId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_LOCK = #{updateLock, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and UPDATE_LOCK = #{holdLock, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
